title: Post Apocalypse
description: It has almost been a year since the world ended. The majority of the population died, came back as mindless and highly aggressive creatures and killed most of the rest. In the midst of horror, young Cody finds romance, in an unsuspecting Troy. While he is desperately trying to find food, he gets attacked and then saved at the last second by Troy, who is a hardened brute who finds that anyone can fall in love, even in ways they wouldn't suspect.
author: Conner Addicott
